casebody.data:
CAPPS
v.
NW SIGN INDUSTRIES et al. No. 383A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. Norman W. Shearin, Jr., Kitty Hawk, for NW Sign Industries, et al. Jared E. Gardner, Richard B. Fennell, Charlotte, for Alan Capps. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of March 2006 by Defendant to Take Judicial Notice of Subsequent Event: "Motion Dismissed as Moot by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2006." Justice MARTIN recused.
